column2: scholarship amount - First Year scholarship amount
Pell Eligible - Pell Grants are awarded based on financial need
First Generation - a student whose parents did not complete a four-year degree
2.       SAT to ACT Conversion Chart: Can be used to convert SAT scores to ACT, to identify test scores on an ACT equivalent scale
Department – name of the department within the college of enrollment
College – College of First term enrollment
FirstTerm_CreditHours - number of credits in first term
First term GPA – GPA obtained in the first term
1-year retention – "1" if the student re-enrolled for the Fall semester one year after they were enrolled to UA, otherwise blank
2-year retention- "1" if the student re-enrolled for the Fall semester two years after they were enrolled to UA, otherwise blank
